item.title: Can the strongest acid dissolve the hardest material?
item.description: We explore the fascinating limits of chemistry by pitting the world's strongest acid against the hardest material

media:content.media:title: Can the strongest acid dissolve the hardest material?
media:content.media:description: We explore the fascinating limits of chemistry by pitting the world's strongest acid against the hardest material

item.title: The simple additive that stops water from splashing instantly
item.description: See how this substance acts like a liquid until stress is applied, making it "not splash" when hit hard.

item.title: Newton's Cradle: The classic physics toy is hiding a scientific secret
item.description: Demonstrating the fundamental laws of conservation of momentum and energy that govern this classic desk toy's unique motion.

item.title: Virtually scuba diving
item.description: Exploring the stunning immersive experience of virtual scuba diving!

item.title: Evanescent waves
item.description: Exploring the physics phenomenon where light waves penetrate a boundary even when total internal reflection occurs. Demonstrating how these non-propagating waves exist and their crucial role in advanced optics.

item.title: The scariest sound in the world
item.description: Exploring the chilling acoustics of the Aztec Death Whistle. Investigating the unique internal design that generates a sound eerily similar to a human scream and analyzing its deep psychological impact on listeners.

item.title: Breaking the sound barrier with a ping-pong ball!
item.description: Demonstrating how a common ping-pong ball, propelled by extreme air pressure, can break the speed of sound! Exploring the physics of shockwaves and the dramatic effects of supersonic travel on a small object.

item.title: The coin doesn’t jump by magic, it’s physics!
item.description: Showing how a blast of air can make a coin jump into a cup! Explaining exactly how the speed of the air relates to its pressure, demonstrating the classic and counter-intuitive Bernoulli's Principle in action.

item.title: The physics behind the greedy cup
item.description: The fascinating "greedy cup," a drinking vessel that empties itself when filled past a certain level.

item.title: How fast can a Tesla turbine really spin?
item.description: Find out just how fast this revolutionary design can spin! I measure the maximum rotational speed and explain the physics behind its unique efficiency.

item.title: Making the heaviest thing on Earth float
item.description: I wanted to test the limits of buoyancy by making an extremely dense object float! I show you the science behind fluid dynamics and density

item.title: The science behind “dry water”
item.description: Can water truly be dry? Discover the physics of this amazing substance, which is 95% pure liquid water encapsulated in silica.

item.title: Why tensegrity structures don’t collapse
item.description: How can a structure appear to float while holding weight? Explore the revolutionary concept of Tensegrity, where continuous tension balances discontinuous compression to achieve surprising stability.

item.title: The formula for finding “the one”?
item.description: Learn the science behind perfect timing! We break down the Optimal Stopping Theorem. Discover the math that tells you the best time to stop searching and make a choice.

item.title: What happens when you try to fill a Klein bottle?
item.description: The Klein Bottle is a 4D mathematical oddity. We test a 3D model to see how its non-orientable surface behaves when filled with liquid. Explore topology and why this shape has no 'inside' or 'outside'!

item.title: How strong is black widow silk compared to steel? ��️ #science #experiment #materials #physics #research #fblifestyle #reels
item.description: How strong is black widow silk compared to steel? ��️ #science #experiment #materials #physics #research #fblifestyle #reels #spider

item.title: How glass challenges our understanding of insulation ��​ #science #physics #experiment #research #materials #fblifestyle #reels
item.description: How glass challenges our understanding of insulation ��​ #science #physics #experiment #research #materials #fblifestyle #reels

item.title: How airflow supports a foil ball without altering weight
item.description: Discover the physics behind suspended objects. Learn how air pressure and force transfer are used to levitate a foil ball in an airstream, demonstrating that the total weight of the system remains unchanged.

item.title: This ladybug can’t resist my pen
item.description: Observe a ladybug's curious attraction to a red ink line.

item.title: The physics of a drone flying in a closed container
item.description: Does a flying drone change the weight of a sealed container? Explore Newton's laws of motion and the principle of conservation of momentum to understand how internal thrust affects total mass.
